title: shankaranai paNI manamE
sahitya:
shankaranai paNi manamE shiva
    dinamE shiva
    sadA shiva
    sAmba shiva


anupallavi

  ponkaravam aNi kankaNanai umai panganai anbarkkirangum dayAkara


caraNam 1    gangaiyuDan iLam tingaL aNindiDum engum nirainda nam mangaLa mUrtiyai
  caraNam 2    immaiyil marumaiyil inbamaLittiDum tammai bhajittiDin nammaiyum ANDaruL
